plot: Clemens Richter shows up at Vera and Heiko and informs them that he has resigned from Löpelmann. His family is very understanding, but then Daniel shows up to pick up Vera. Löpelmann wants Clemens back, but only on the condition that he begs on his knees for his old job. So Löpelmann spins a web of intrigues so that Clemens doesn't get a chance at any other agency. Elke has now recovered enough that she can be interrogated. The lawyer expects a murder charge against her.
